mapper.delete: UPDATE AccessRights SET curStatus=0 WHERE accessId=#{accessId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM AccessRights WHERE accessId = #{accessId} AND CURSTATUS=2
SELECT * FROM AccessRights WHERE accessId in (${_parameter }) AND CURSTATUS=2
SELECT pageId FROM AccessRights WHERE roleId in (${_parameter }) AND accessType = 'info' AND CURSTATUS=2
SELECT * FROM AccessRights WHERE CURSTATUS=2 order by recordTime desc

SELECT * FROM AccessRights
and pageId like concat('%', #{pageId}, '%') and roleId like concat('%', #{roleId}, '%') and accessType like concat('%', #{accessType}, '%') and curStatus=2
order by recordTime desc
select count(*) from AccessRights WHERE CURSTATUS=2

SELECT count(*) FROM AccessRights
and pageId like concat('%', #{pageId}, '%') and roleId like concat('%', #{roleId}, '%') and accessType like concat('%', #{accessType}, '%') and curStatus=2
order by recordTime desc

SELECT a.pageid as pageid,r.userName as userName FROM (select pageid,roleId from AccessRights where accessType = #{accessType} and curStatus=2 GROUP BY roleid) a join roledefines r on a.roleId = r.roleId where r.curStatus=2

SELECT a.pageid,m.pageTitle,a.roleid,r.roleTitle,m.menuNum, max(case accesstype when 'info' then accessId else 0 end) acc_info, max(case accesstype when 'add' then accessId else 0 end) acc_add, max(case accesstype when 'modi' then accessId else 0 end) acc_modi, max(case accesstype when 'delete' then accessId else 0 end) acc_delete, max(case accesstype when 'import' then accessId else 0 end) acc_import, max(case accesstype when 'export' then accessId else 0 end) acc_export, max(case accesstype when 'send' then accessId else 0 end) acc_send FROM accessrights a JOIN myurlregist m ON a.pageid=m.pageId JOIN roledefines r ON a.roleId=r.roleId
(a.pageid=#{_parameter} OR m.parentId=#{_parameter}) and a.curStatus=2
group by pageid,roleid order by pageid asc
